channel.title: BattleIsland Beta - Pking Server
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[img]http://oi42.tinypic.com/2qs8574.jpg[/img]
[B]Welcome Information ~[/B] The Server is in BETA. When server is done. Account will be reset to level 3. Currently server is "PKING".
[SIZE=4]Server Status - BETA[/SIZE]
[size=18pt]You can use :: Master or Pure to start pking Edgeville or Mage Bank[/size]
[SIZE=4][URL=http://battleisland.cu.cc/]Home[/URL] - [URL=http://battleisland.cu.cc//forum]Forum[/URL] - [URL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/h9eheycpnocu5nl/BattleIsland.rar]Download Client[/URL][/SIZE]
Staff Are Open Adminstrator - - - Moderator - - - -
[B]Pking Base Server Feature[/B] PVP Drop PK Point Minigame Skills
[b][color=green][SIZE=5]You can type :: Master or :: Pure and start to pker in edgeville.[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[B]Starter Pack[/B] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3419926/login.JPG[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3419082/background.JPG[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3420438/status.JPG[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3419927/bank.JPG[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3420432/pking.JPG[/img]
Credit : AFG- , Sanity and more.
[/CENTER]
